description: Hi, My name is Khang. I am a Web Developer and freelancer. I
discovered my passion for Web Development after a period of time that
I dived into a bunch of things. I jumped into a various languages and
move to another after a certain time. It's just a process of trial and
error which I willing to try new and unfamiliar things to discover the
thing that I would like to live with my career. On that journey, I
throw myself into a numerous fields like Windows Forms Application,
Computer Vision, and even Machine Learning. I give myself a try with
many things, but I do not have any insight into specific field. I used
to think that Information Technology is not right for me until I
discovered Web Development. From that moment, I've put months of my
life in on Web Development to get to know and live with it. I hope
that I could notice Web Development sooner as possible in my life, but
it did not make me regret. Because on that journey, I could learn a
lot of things, specially the way that adapting and dealing with new
things. I strongly believe that it will help me out to stay in control
in the ever-changing world of technology.

content: I am the type of person if you ask me a question and I do not know
the answer, I am going to tell you that I do not know. But I bet you
what. I know how to find the answer, and I will find the answer.

selfStudy: Belong studying at school, I spend most of my time to take advantage of Web Development by taking various courses on Udemy about HTML, CSS, Javascript, NodeJS,...
I really put my foot in my projects at school with all my effort instead of just passing the exams.

teamwork.description: I have a chance to take part in a lot of projects with my classmates and also my university lecturer. Each project, I gained a lot of worth experience that I would not know if I just spent time studying at school.
content: Teamwork skill: doing projects with numerous of different people helps me improving my communication skills and integrate with other people more easily.
Aware of the importance of clean code for maintaining purpose.
Knowing the way that start a project from scratch with step by step like gathering customer requirements, planing, designing database, coding and testing.
Being aware of database importance, therefore spending more time on analysis and design database.
Knowing how to use Git and Github for project management and integrate with other members.
Knowing how to create API Documentation to help Font-End and Back-End communicate more easily.
Knowing more about security like JWT, Authentication, Authorization,... and hacking method like Phishing, SQL Injection, Cross Site Scripting (XSS),...
Improving my self-learning skill and research skill.

projects.title: Scientific Research: Applying Computer Vision to Smart Camera
description: Applying Computer Vision on Raspberry Pi for detecting and tracking people.
Keeping specific person always in the middle of the frame by rotating camera with servos.
technology: GPIO.pi module for controlling and rotating servos
ImageZMQ for live video streaming from Raspberry Pi to server
responsibility: Design and assemble model for connecting Raspberry Pi, camera and servos
Creating module for detecting and tracking
Creating module for controlling and rotating servos

projects.title: Image Captioning
description: Building model for predict caption for image with Vietnamese caption.
Setting up image captioning model on server to predict caption for image from Raspberry Pi Camera.
Sending caption back from server to Raspberry Pi in order to speak out loud by speaker.
technology: ImageZMQ for sending image from Raspberry Pi Camera to server
responsibility: Setting up environment for connection between server and Raspberry Pi.

projects.title: Freelance: Sport Live Streaming Web Application
description: Developing sport live streaming web application using HTTP Live Streaming FFMPEG
responsibility: Rendering pages by using PUG View Engine

projects.title: Agricutural Cooperatives 4.0
description: Developing a system for agricutural production managing and diary logging.
Web application for managing all facilies like plant production product, fertilizer, medical instrument,...
Mobile application for logging all production diary of farmers.
